channel.title: Just a thought
channel.description: Due to people always asking how to downgrade their client maybe have a link that scrolls by in the announcements thing above to a link telling you how to downgrade. I feel like that would come in handy from time to time.

item.title: Just a thought
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Something like this?

http://up.ht/HGoNNq

Just threw this together real quick with the efficient help of javadocs, obviously not very well written in some aspects but it should do the job. Please note - I can’t comment on the safety of the JAR as I didn’t provide/check them. So if somebody wants to do that then nice one

It shouldn’t take more than 20 seconds to complete the task, a large portion of waiting time is obviously downloading the JAR as the host isn’t that quick. If somebody wants to redo it to be better then I’d welcome that.

Maybe include a GUI and so on. If anyone can be bothered, then here:

http://pastebin.com/z5whRE0s

Forgive the random indentations at parts, and my scattering of random code+numbers. I started experimenting with random functions that I didn’t remove completely part way through

Read full topic

item.title: Just a thought
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“deathwilldie0, post:4, topic:437932”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=540647.msg3959768#msg3959768 date=1333161449]

Due to people always asking how to downgrade their client maybe have a link that scrolls by in the announcements thing above to a link telling you how to downgrade. I feel like that would come in handy from time to time.
[/quote]Problem being the scroll news thing goes on all 3 forums, mite look odd

Oh yeah, I forgot it shows it all all the forums. I just think something needs to be done. Maybe have a link to the topic on how to downgrade in the rules, even though a good bit of new members don’t read it I’m sure some do.[/quote]
I’m working on a launcher. if MITB wanted to put up the proper pages, and BIN, I could make it all redirect to moparcraft instead of Mojangs amazon stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Just a thought
item.dc:creator: @deathwilldie0 deathwilldie0
item.description:
@deathwilldie0 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:2, topic:437932”][quote author=deathwilldie0 link=topic=540647.msg3959627#msg3959627 date=1333148204]
Due to people always asking how to downgrade their client maybe have a link that scrolls by in the announcements thing above to a link telling you how to downgrade. I feel like that would come in handy from time to time.
[/quote]Problem being the scroll news thing goes on all 3 forums, mite look odd :/[/quote]
Oh yeah, I forgot it shows it all all the forums. I just think something needs to be done. Maybe have a link to the topic on how to downgrade in the rules, even though a good bit of new members don’t read it I’m sure some do.

Read full topic

item.title: Just a thought
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

You could add a redirect link to a download that either has the version of minecraft that you need, or make a version checker that checks what version mopar is on and changes your client version? idk, just a though

Read full topic
